main event: Three small bright silver orbs with a spinning motion were observed in Silver Springs, Maryland on August 3, 1959.
interesting points: The objects appeared to move, stop, and change direction, traveling north and gaining altitude.
One or the other of the two silver orbs would move, then the other would move in the same pattern.
The objects were observed for about 15 minutes.
The witness described the objects as 'small bright silver orbs that appeared to have a spinning motion'.
No sound was reported from the objects.
